titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation prohibiting His Majesties subjects to enter into the service of foreign princes and states
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Kensington the twenty eighth day of January, 1697 in the ninth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

person.persName: Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd
